column5: Headed out last week with some fellow OFC members. First was Greg...we managed to catch around 25 bass, some decent sized perch and a walleye. Here are some of the pics.         Second out was Sonicpike. Shortly after heading out I had a nice musky on but it broke the line. We managed about 20 bass that day between the 2 of us. Most fish were taken using black senkos or small white or black spinner baits.
some nice fish you guys got into!  Good to see scugog producing!  Cheers!
Nice stuff guys.  Gotta love the bog but is it just me or is black the new chartruese this year?  Everyone seems to be tossing black and doing well - damnit I don't wanna buy all new colours again!
Some nice buckets there. How big was the Walleye?
Great report and good to see members hooking up and getting out there!  Some nice lunkers caught there....good job!
